node.display_long_description:
“This is the kind of social videogame Oculus Quest was made for.” - VRFocus
“... offers up everything that I could ask for in an immersive VR experience." - 
TheGamer

Get Your Aprons Ready… Things Are About To Get Messy!

Set within the cook’s cabin of a fairytale forest, Cook-Out: A Sandwich Tale is a wacky and whimsical adventure that challenges up to four players to work together to keep the orders coming for a cast of enchanted creatures in this multiplayer VR title from Resolution Games.

As players progress through increasingly hectic levels, they not only prepare meals but also need to fight off a number of nasty customers who seem absolutely set on making trouble -- like jesters who hide parts of orders, or thieves who keep pilfering ingredients.

While the game is focused on cooperative play, solo players will be able to enjoy the experience with the help of a simulated partner, making sure there’s always a team to tackle tough orders and restore the calm to this wild kitchen

nodes.title: Game Update: The Recipe Hunt is On!
nodes.body_text: Get ready to hunt down more recipes in Creative Mode and unlock new cleavers, cutting boards and fridges to show off to all of your friends! We just released an update including more than 50 new recipes and a bunch of rewards to unlock. Strap on your apron and start cooking!

nodes.title: Holiday update – new game mode and other festivities!
nodes.body_text:
Ho-ho-hold the lettuce and pass the turkey and mashed potatoes! The jolliest update of the season is now available. Check out the new creative mode where you can make any sandwiches you want and serve them to Santa and the reindeer, earn the festive rewards and find the hidden recipes!

- New Ingredients: What would the holidays be without turkey, candy canes, mashed potatoes, and a gingerbread house?
- New Characters: Santa knows how to keep warm (he’s a Polar Bear, after all), and so do his reindeer in their tacky Christmas sweaters
- New Environment: Your favorite village will feature snow, decorations, and more to bring the holidays to life -- including a few indoor decorations in your own kitchen
- Surprises: If you’ve been really good this year, Santa just might leave a new cleaver, cutting board, or fridge under your tree. And if you look carefully, there might even be some sandwich recipes for you to discover
Oculus Quest 2 improvements: We’ve added better graphics, refresh rate and assets for the new headset.

Additional bug fixes and updates have also been made to  the game.

We hope you enjoy the new updates. Happy holidays from all of us at Resolution Games!

node.reviewDescription:
When I got the oculus quest 2, I looked for multiplayer games that could be used with the same oculus account (as I still have the quest 1). 

I have been playing this nonstop with my partner and it is addicting. It is a great mix of challenging and fun. In game rewards like knives and cutting boards make you want to 3-star every level. 

Highly recommend, especially if you are looking for a multiplayer experience.

website_page_meta.description:
Get Your Aprons Ready… Things Are About To Get Messy!

In Cook-Out: A Sandwich Tale, players of Resolution Games’ multiplayer VR game work together to cook their way through a wacky and whimsical adventure to keep the customers happy and progress through increasingly hectic levels. But don’t dish it if you can’t take it, because these customers mean business.
website_page_meta.title: Cook-Out · Oculus Quest
